resources.string: You Leveled UP! +1 Health Potions you now have:
New Here? Click The Help Button Below to learn how to play!
Not all monsters on each level are equal.\n\nPay attenion to your health bar and how much damage you are taking to time your health potions best!

Movement: Use the directional buttons (Up, Down, Left, Right) to navigate the dungeon. Explore rooms and avoid getting trapped by walls.

Combat: When you encounter a monster, a battle begins automatically. Defeat enemies to progress, but flee if needed—though it risks your health!

Health (HP): Monitor your health via the green progress bar. Take damage in battles, and use potions to heal when available.

Experience (XP): Earn XP by defeating monsters, tracked in the yellow progress bar. Gain enough XP to level up, increasing your stats.

Potions: Use potions to restore health (50–75% of max HP) when your supply allows. Collect more by leveling up.

Zoom and Pan: Pinch to zoom in/out (1x to 3x) and drag to pan the camera, helping you survey the dungeon.

Winning: Clear all monsters on a level to advance. The game ends if your health drops to zero—submit your score to the leaderboard!

Your mission is to conquer the dungeon by defeating all monsters across multiple levels. Start as a brave adventurer and aim to reach the highest level possible, proving your skill on the leaderboard. Survive battles, level up, and use potions wisely to become the ultimate champion!
